resources.string:
Calendar Import/Export

Importing

Select the destination calendar from the drop down list at the top of the screen.


Click Import File or Import URL and choose the file/URL to load. You may enter login details for URLs that require them.


For Import File, ensure the file you wish to import is selected from the drop down list that appears.


Click the Load button to load the events from the file.


Click Insert entries to import the events into the destination calendar.


Click Delete entries to remove the events in the file from the destination calendar.


Exporting

Select the source calendar from the drop down list at the top of the screen.


Click Export and enter the file name to save. Note that if the calendar is empty, the Export button will not be enabled.


Click OK to complete the export.


Support and Development

You can help development by translating, reporting bugs or submitting changes at www.schuermann.eu/android. If you have problems importing a specific iCalendar file, please provide it when reporting a bug.
